Do not covet thy neighbour's Wi-Fi. To dream of pilfering internet access from them is punishable by death. #AwfullyBritishCommandments
Blessed are those who complain about train service, but roll their eyes when someone suggests cycling to work. #AwfullyBritishCommandments
Thou shalt never introduce milk into a cup of tea first. It is an abomination. Seriously guys, don't do it. #AwfullyBritishCommandments

Got to head down to Cardiff for an F&HR meeting tomorrow afternoon. I'm determined not to let this unforeseen development change my plans.
Would have picked up my prescription today but finding an open pharmacy on Sunday is nigh-on impossible. So am picking it up Monday morning.
After a painful procedure (dentist apologised profusely) the swelling has started to deflate and I'm starting a course of Amoxicillin soon.
Woke up this morn with an ugly, uncomfortable abscess on the right side of my face. Had to get it sorted by emergency dentist in Pontypridd.

Not particularly to easy keep warm on a winter night when your bedroom is the coldest room on a ground floor flat. I would not recommend it.
Nothing quite compares to getting real cosy with Betty. She helps me peacefully drift off to sleep, and I'm lost without her.
I could stick the heating on for a bit, but then I'd have to eventually get out of my comfy bed to switch it off. These are desperate times.
Missing: One purple hot water bottle. Last seen somewhere in my bedroom the other day. I'm so sorry for neglecting you, Betty. Come home.
